input.sentences: some of the buildings were magnificent .
the inside of the buildings had great architecture .
we went to the church that day .
everyone went on the rides before they left .
output.sentences: We went sightseeing and found a magnificent building.
Inside it had beautiful architectural style.
As we were walking down the street, we saw the most unique street lamps.
We also noticed a church with a cross on its steeple.
As we were leaving, we drove past a festival with people on rides and we decided to go back and join in on the fun!
